about_the_game:
Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted.
PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

Our goal is to provide a safe, fun & exciting experience for everyone. You can explore the user generated content, have a chat with your friends or watch a movie together! The choice is yours at any time.
We provide a way to seamlessly switch between VR & Desktop mode quickly without having to restart the game. This allows you to test something in VR or need to take a quick VR break without having to shut everything down.

We want to shape this platform based on your feedback so we can deliver the best experience for you.



With our Unity based Content Creation Kit (CCK) you can easily upload and manage your content.
We designed the CCK to be both powerful and easy to use for anyone.
For custom content, PoligonVR utilizes "Single-pass instanced rendering" which provides VR performance benefits compared to the traditional "Multi-pass rendering".



We provide a safe, high performant scripting solution we call "P#".
With P#, you can create complex worlds where you are in control of the world logic. Within our CCK we provide examples of common world logics such as buttons, video players and much more. Because they are powered by P#, you can modify & tweak the provided examples to your needs at any given time.



Experience super immersive audio with Steam Audio.
We allow world creators to integrate Steam Audio directly into their worlds & the voice chat to provide a realistic and immersive experience.



You can upload your own custom avatars, or try out public avatars created by others or ask a friend to share their avatar with you!



Sparked your interest? Join our Discord server for more information on how to join the closed-beta and future updates!

name: PoligonVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
